body: A underground druid adds Knowledge (dungeoneering) rather than Knowledge (geography) as a class skill and gains a +2 bonus on Knowledge (dungeoneering) and Survival skill checks. This ability replaces the nature sense ability.
name: Cavesense
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Cave Druid/Cavesense
